didyouknow: This story is based on focus group interviews with members from this community, and deals with an important element of the Sikh identiity.
This story is based on real stories of inter-faith relationships, and of understanding your own faith as a young adult. There are hidden struggles that many go through.
There were many serious issues raised in this chapter, and it may help to research more and discuss these issues with trusted friends from other communities.
Inter-cultural relationships are increasingly common in Singapore - but there are still hurdles and hardships along the way.
